title: The Perfect Day + Lunchbox In Work Trouble + Amy's Pedicure Nap
itunes:title: The Perfect Day + Lunchbox In Work Trouble + Amy's Pedicure Nap
description:
Bobby and Amy talk about what makes their perfect day. Lunchbox forged a boss's signature on a work document. Amy fell asleep in the chair while getting a pedicure.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
